verses.verse: (A Psalm of Asaph.) <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5324>takes<s%> His <S%H5324>stand<s%> in His own <S%H5712>congregation;<s%> He <S%H8199>judges<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H430>rulers.<s%>
<S%H6403>Rescue<s%> the <S%H1800>weak<s%> and <S%H34>needy;<s%> <S%H5337>Deliver<s%> [them] out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>

They do not <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> do they <S%H995>understand;<s%> They <S%H1980>walk<s%> about in <S%H2825>darkness;<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H4144>foundations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> are <S%H4131>shaken.<s%>
I <S%H559>said,<s%> "You are <S%H430>gods,<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> of you are <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H9411>Most<s%> <S%H9411>High.<s%>
<S%H403>"Nevertheless<s%> you will <S%H4191>die<s%> like <S%H120>men,<s%> And <S%H5307>fall<s%> like [any] <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H8269>princes.<s%>"
<S%H6965>Arise,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H776>earth!<s%> For it is Thou who dost <S%H5157>possess<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>
